fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Housekeeper: Every time you enter a limited room, there is a 50% chance that you may get the room benefit and not count toward the room total.
- Full House: When you end the phase with exactly 5 non-satcheled cards in hand, randomly satchel 1 of them.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Vaults: Gain a card of your choice. [2 uses, 6 CD, UOR2, Post-Mortem]
- Passages: Visit another room on top of your regular room that isnâ€™t listed in available rooms. Cannot be role specific rooms. [1 use, Unique, Night]
- Keys: Select a room to appear in the next Night phase. [1 use, Unique, Graveyard]
